languages.text: {n}Глаза Кибеллы быстро скользят по изувеченным трупам, впитывая каждую кровавую деталь.{/n} "Здесь совершено кощунство. Это не просто бойня, а... подношение собственной жажде. Тот, кто творил это, славил не Неумирающего, а... кого-то иного. Что-то иное".

{n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Кибеллы быстро скользят по изувеченным трупам, впитывая каждую кровавую деталь.{/n} "Здесь совершено кощунство. Это не просто бойня, а... подношение собственной жажде. Тот, кто творил это, славил не Неумирающего, а... кого-то иного. Что-то иное".

This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

{n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah recorre con la mirada los cadáveres mutilados, bebiendo los detalles con los ojos.{/n} «Sacrilegio. Esto va más allá de la masacre. Es una... ofrenda a la propia sed. El responsable de esto no buscaba honrar al Inmortal sino a alguien... o algo diferente».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah recorre con la mirada los cadáveres mutilados, bebiendo los detalles con los ojos.{/n} «Sacrilegio. Esto va más allá de la masacre. Es una... ofrenda a la propia sed. El responsable de esto no buscaba honrar al Inmortal sino a alguien... o algo diferente».

languages.text: {n}キベラの目は、切り刻まれた死体を素早くとらえ、血なまぐさい細部まで吸収した。 {/n}「冒涜だ。これは単なる虐殺ではない…これは自らの渇きへの供物だった。これを行った者は、不死の者を称えようとしたのではなく、むしろ…他の誰かを称えようとしたのだ。他の誰かだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの目は、切り刻まれた死体を素早くとらえ、血なまぐさい細部まで吸収した。 {/n}「冒涜だ。これは単なる虐殺ではない…これは自らの渇きへの供物だった。これを行った者は、不死の者を称えようとしたのではなく、むしろ…他の誰かを称えようとしたのだ。他の誰かだ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的目光很快就注意到了那些残缺不全的尸体，没有放过任何一个鲜血淋漓的细节。{/n}“何等亵渎。这并不仅仅是屠杀，而是在……献上祭品，缓解饥渴。那个杀人凶手并不是在祭拜不死之神，而是……别的什么人，什么东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的目光很快就注意到了那些残缺不全的尸体，没有放过任何一个鲜血淋漓的细节。{/n}“何等亵渎。这并不仅仅是屠杀，而是在……献上祭品，缓解饥渴。那个杀人凶手并不是在祭拜不死之神，而是……别的什么人，什么东西。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Blick erfassen rasch die verstümmelten Leichen, jedes blutige Detail.{/n} "Sakrileg. Das war mehr als ein Massaker, das war ... eine Opfergabe, um den eigenen Durst zu stillen. Der Täter wollte damit nicht den Todlosen ehren, sondern ... jemand anderen. Etwas anderes."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Blick erfassen rasch die verstümmelten Leichen, jedes blutige Detail.{/n} "Sakrileg. Das war mehr als ein Massaker, das war ... eine Opfergabe, um den eigenen Durst zu stillen. Der Täter wollte damit nicht den Todlosen ehren, sondern ... jemand anderen. Etwas anderes."

languages.text: {n}D'un bref coup d'œil, Kibellah embrasse du regard les corps mutilés, assimilant au passage jusqu'au moindre détail sanglant.{/n} « Sacrilège. Plus qu'un simple massacre, il s'agit là d'une... offrande destinée à étancher la soif d'une entité quelconque. Quel qu'il soit, le meurtrier ne cherchait pas à honorer l'Immortel, mais... quelqu'un d'autre. Quelque chose d'autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un bref coup d'œil, Kibellah embrasse du regard les corps mutilés, assimilant au passage jusqu'au moindre détail sanglant.{/n} « Sacrilège. Plus qu'un simple massacre, il s'agit là d'une... offrande destinée à étancher la soif d'une entité quelconque. Quel qu'il soit, le meurtrier ne cherchait pas à honorer l'Immortel, mais... quelqu'un d'autre. Quelque chose d'autre. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri, tahrip edilen cesetleri anında incelemeye başlayarak tüm nahoş ayrıntıları zihnine kazıyor.{/n} "Kutsala hürmetsizlik. Burada sıradan bir katliamdan fazlası yaşanmış. Bu... Birinin susuzluğunu giderecek bir adak. Bu katliamı gerçekleştiren, Ölmeyen'den ziyade... Başka birine hürmetini sunmaya çalışmış. Başka biri..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's eyes quickly take in the mutilated corpses, absorbing every gory detail.{/n} "Sacrilege. This was more than just a massacre, it was... an offering to one's own thirst. The one who did this was not trying to honour the Undying One, but rather... someone else. Something else."
